00053 #ifndef _RTAI_NUCLEUS_POD_H

00059 #include <nucleus/thread.h>

00062 /* Creation flags */
00063 #define XNDREORD 0x00000001     /* Don't reorder pend queues upon prio change */
00064 
00065 /* Pod status flags */
00066 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00067 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00068 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00069 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00070 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00071 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00072 
00073 /* Sched status flags */
00074 #define XNKCOUT      0x80000000 /* Sched callout context */
00075 #define XNHTICK      0x40000000 /* Host tick pending  */
00076 #define XNSCHEDMASK  ~(XNKCOUT|XNHTICK)
00077 
00078 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00079 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00080 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00081 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00082 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00083 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00084 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00085 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00086 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00087 
00088 /* Flags for context checking */
00089 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00090 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00091 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00092 
00093 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00094 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00095 
00096 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICK         XNARCH_DEFAULT_TICK
00097 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00098 
00099 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00100 
00101 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (128 * 1024)
00102 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00103 #define XNPOD_RUNPRI    0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00104 
00105 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00106 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00107 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00108 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00109 
00110 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00111 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00117 typedef struct xnsched {
00118 
00119     xnflags_t status;           
00121     xnarch_cpumask_t resched;   
00123     xnpqueue_t readyq;          
00125     xnthread_t rootcb;          
00127     xnthread_t *runthread;      
00129 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_HW_FPU
00130     xnthread_t *fpuholder;      
00131 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_HW_FPU */
00132 
00133     volatile unsigned inesting; 
00135 } xnsched_t;
00136 
00137 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__) \
00138     ((__sched__) - &nkpod->sched[0])
00139 
00140 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00141     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00142 
00143 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00144     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00145 
00146 #define xnsched_tst_resched(__sched__) \
00147     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00148 
00149 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__) \
00150     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00151 
00152 #define xnsched_clr_resched(__sched__) \
00153     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00154 
00155 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00156     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00248 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod) {
00249     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00250     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00251 }
00252 
00253 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr) {
00254     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00255         pod->minpri + incr :
00256         pod->minpri - incr;
00257 }
00258 
00259 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr) {
00260     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00261         pod->maxpri - incr :
00262         pod->maxpri + incr;
00263 }
00264 
00265 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio) {
00266     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00267        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00268     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00269     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00270 }
00271 
00272 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00273 
00274 {
00275     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00276     spl_t s;
00277 
00278     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00279     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00280     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00281     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00282     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00283 }
00284 
00285     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00286 
00287 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00288     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00289 
00290 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00291     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00292 
00293 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00294     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00295 
00296 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00297     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00298 
00299 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00300     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00301 
00302 #if defined(__GNUC__) && ( __GNUC__ > 2 || __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ > 95 )
00303 static inline xnthread_t *xnpod_current_thread (void) __attribute__((pure));
00304 #endif
00305 
00306 static inline xnthread_t *xnpod_current_thread (void)
00307 
00308 {
00309     xnarch_declare_cpuid;
00310     xnthread_t *thread;
00311     spl_t s;
00312 
00313     xnarch_get_cpu(s);
00314     thread = xnpod_sched_slot(cpuid)->runthread;
00315     xnarch_put_cpu(s);
00316 
00317     return thread;
00318 }
00319 
00320 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00321     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00322 
00323 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00324     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00325 
00326 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00327     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00328 
00329 #define xnpod_pendable_p() \
00330     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK)))
00331 
00332 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00333     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00334 
00335 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00336     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00337 
00338 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00339     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00340 
00341 #define xnpod_regular_p() \
00342     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00343 
00344 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00345 
00346 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00347     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00353 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void) {
00354     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00355     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00356 }

00358 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks) {
00359     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00360     return xnarch_llimd(ticks,xnpod_get_tickval(),1);
00361 }
00362 
00363 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t) {
00364     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00365 }

00419 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void) {
00420 
00421     /* Don't swap these two lines... */
00422     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->schedlck);
00423     __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00424 }
00425 
00426 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void) {
00427 
00428     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->schedlck))
00429         {
00430         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00431         xnpod_schedule();
00432         }
00433 }

00463 static inline void xnpod_yield (void) {
00464     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00465     xnpod_schedule();
00466 }

00468 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout) {
00469     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00470 }

00472 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void) {
00473     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00474 }

00476 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void) {
00477     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
